Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
@Sdunbar Please try to do following:
```cd ~/komodo
git checkout jl777
git pull
make clean
cd src
rm komodod komodo-cli komodo-tx *.so
cd cc
rm *.so
cd rogue
make clean
cd ../../..
./zcutil/build.sh -j$(nproc)```
